name: Trimble Tekla
description: Trimble Tekla was a project consisting of two parts. One part was the desktop application and the other part was the web application that was integrated into the desktop application. I worked on the web application, which was an Angular application that used .NET Core for the backend.

name: Cata Portofolio
description: This is my portofolio. It is built with the latest Angular features. Using zoneless change detection and signal-store for state management.
